mapper.select: SELECT ComCode,ROA,TLToTA,CurrentRatio,GrossProfitMargin,TotalAssetTurnover FROM gangao.COM_MAINFINAINDEXNAS WHERE ComCode = #{ComCode} and dataFlag = 101 and ReportType = #{reportType} and EndDate = #{endDate}

select c.comcode,c.ENDDATE,c.REPORTTYPE,c.DATAFLAG, c.ROA,c.TLToTA,c.CurrentRatio,c.GrossProfitMargin,c.TotalAssetTurnover from gangao.COM_MAINFINAINDEXNAS c INNER JOIN ( select a.COMCODE FROM gangao.STK_BASICINFO a INNER JOIN (select STOCKCODE from datacenter.intelligent_stock) b on a.TRADINGCODE = b.STOCKCODE and a.SecuCategoryCodeII = '1001' )d on c.comcode = d.COMCODE and c.dataFlag = 101 and c.EndDate = #{endDate} and c.ReportType = #{reportType} ORDER BY c.comcode
